title: Separate circuit requirements
fullText:
One or more separate circuits shall be provided for each of the following specific types of electrical equipment:
(a)	Socket-outlets.
(b)	Lighting points.
(c)	Permanently connected welding equipment.
(d)	Other specific electrical equipment as required by AS/NZS 3000.
(e)	Transportable structures (see also Clause 2.9 and AS/NZS 3001).
(f)	Auxiliary socket-outlet panels.
